Konnichiwa!

I'm waiting in anticipation of receiving my first order of Jap=
anese 28mm Samurai miniatures for wargaming.

In preparation I've been doin=
g a lot of research in regard to the armour, especially odoshi colors and p=
atterns.

I came across some info I thought some of you might like as well.=


http://www.sengokudaimyo.com/katchu/katchu.ch05.html

http://www.sengokud=
aimyo.com/katchu/katchu.ch05a.html

The above links are part of an on-line =
Japanese armour manual: http://www.sengokudaimyo.com/katchu/katchu.html

An=
other, good, on-line armor source is here: http://www.myarmoury.com/feature=
_jpn_armour.html

Ki o tsukete
Larry
